website_summaries.verdict: Fashion-forward with an intriguing frame color pattern.  Smaller framed, potentially unisex option.
pros: Lenses offer UVA and UVB protection
cons: Style is best for smaller faces

customer_reviews.title: 1) I ordered two different colors to see which I liked more. One pair that arrived was a different ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not purchase these for two reasons: 1) I ordered two different colors to see which I liked more. One pair that arrived was a different brand and not authentic. The fulfillment center sent me a pair of comically cheap Prada sunglasses. These were obvious knock-offs. 2.) The second pair that arrived appeared to be Persol, but I'm highly skeptical of their authenticity. The frames feel flimsy and the retailer has no online presence. Please save yourself the time and hassle. Do not order these.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: better for women
customer_reviews.text: my husband bought these for him but gave them to me because they are smaller/finer more for a womens face then a man. unless he is a small sized guy with a small face. My husband is 5'10" 200lbs if that helps you understand it was too little for his face.
customer_reviews.author: elid

customer_reviews.title: Love these glasses
customer_reviews.text: I love these sunglasses. They look great on, and this size is right for people who have a normal-size head. The larger ones are too big. My only complaint with them is that the inside of the lenses are blue-mirrored as well, which means you can catch some glare. I don't care. They're my jam. Third pair, and I'll keep buying them as long as someone sells em.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: These are the best sunglasses that I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sunglasses that I have ever had. They look great and the lens are extreemly clear. Amazon's price was less than half of the price in two retail stores where I had previously looked at these sunglasses. Delivery was in two days and arrived on a Sunday. Couldn't be happier with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: R. Landon

customer_reviews.title: Love these---but are not for everyone
customer_reviews.text: I am a big Persol Fan. This is my third pair...and now, by far my favorite. This said, know that these are not for everyone. They are 52mm, with 18mm nose bridge, so if you have a wider face, they will look very small on you. I have a lean face and wanted a pair of smaller, well fitting frames and I am not disappointed in the least. Love the combination of the Terra Di Sienna frames with the blue lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Style and Great Workmanship
customer_reviews.text: The style and quality are great. Purchasing sunglasses is highly personal. We all have different requirements. Apparently, my face is wider than that of some, so they didn't fit well on my head. Reluctantly, I sent them back. Fortunately, I could do that because I have Amazon Prime. I suspect that, if your face is more or less within the average range, they will fit fine. I loved everything else about them.
customer_reviews.author: Ellis Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great but always break after about a year
customer_reviews.text: I've had 3 or 4 pairs of these and they're great, but the frame always snaps in the same place (the thinnest part) after about a year.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. E. Sauce

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful sunglasses.
customer_reviews.text: Very beautiful and original sunglasses for a low price. I returned them back since the frame is very small. Its 52mm
customer_reviews.author: Obarel

customer_reviews.title: really beautiful sunglasses frames
customer_reviews.text: Persol makes really, really beautiful sunglasses frames. Their timeless elegance means I know I'm buying a fashion accessory that will *stay* in fashion for years to come. This specific design nails it. And I also happen to have a giant head (baseball cap size 7 3/4) and the 95/31 fit my head perfectly. Couldn't be happier with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: David Somerset

customer_reviews.title: I borrowed a pair of Persol polarized sunglasses that were ...
customer_reviews.text: I borrowed a pair of Persol polarized sunglasses that were spectacular. Unfortunately, these sunglasses are not polarized, are overpriced and are just average. I don’t know, maybe they’ll last a 100 years if never dropped, scratched or laundered.
customer_reviews.author: tdf

customer_reviews.title: Frames crack over time..:(
customer_reviews.text: I'm a huge fan of Persol, my current eyeglasses are Persol. However after owning these sunglasses for two years, the frames dried up (oddly enough) and cracked in several locations. Not what I was expecting. A bit disappointing...I will think twice about my next persol purchase as they're clearly not built for the long haul.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Very cool love them. Not the best pair of glasses if you have a big or wide face. Price was good. Love amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: I read several reviews that stated these were good for folks with “larger heads” well these were some ...
customer_reviews.text: I read several reviews that stated these were good for folks with “larger heads” well these were some of the smallest glasses I’ve ever tried on so be warned. They did appear to be well made but designed for very small faces.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Price

customer_reviews.title: Verry happy
customer_reviews.text: Great fit lenses are fantastic you can't beat the price for Persol. Get compliments every time I wear them especially with the keyhole bridge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As Always, Top Grade
customer_reviews.text: I work outside (have for years), and nothing is better on my eyes than Persol. Classic styling, durable and of the finest quality. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Nielsen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great looking sunglasses. Awesome metal case with magnetic closure. Large size cleaning cloth too. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Matt H

customer_reviews.title: Expensive Looking
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful sunglasses. Very sleek and expensive looking. I wish they were polarized. Would give 5 stars for that.
customer_reviews.author: Jersey Girl

customer_reviews.title: Too small but look great
customer_reviews.text: Very narrow. Didn’t fit my face but they fit my wife’s perfectly. I ended up returning them but that’s the risk you take when ordering online without trying them on. Other than that they were great looking glasses!
customer_reviews.author: Allie Cate Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit if you know your size and style. High Quality
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly, a beautiful shine, to the touch you feel the quality of the mount. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ing. Raymundo Diaz Abreu

customer_reviews.title: Cool Shades
customer_reviews.text: Great style and quality and performance. Wanted a Non polarized sun glass to improve car dash readability. These do that and look sharp in the process.
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: great glasses.
customer_reviews.text: not sure why these say women's! However, I wear and these glasses kill the glare off of the reflection on other vehicles in traffic.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: My favorite new sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: They arrived much quicker than expected, and I'm wearing them all the time. It's clear I am going to have to keep my eye on them, and not let them get pilfered like my last pair of "good sunglasses" was. Persol is my new favorite brand!
customer_reviews.author: D. M. Cavalier

customer_reviews.title: Quality Sunglasses-Persolmakes an excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sunglasses, but not as large as you might assume. Glass and not plastic lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Authentic, exceptional condition - size not as described
customer_reviews.text: Arrived, but definitely, 100%, I'm looking at them now 55mm, NOT the 52 as expected/described. Wish I could keep them but my head just aint big enough.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Cheetham

customer_reviews.title: Not be poloroid they have a funny glare. I would buy poloroid next time
customer_reviews.text: Not be poloroid they have a funny glare. I would buy poloroid next time. Also smaller frames than what I expected
customer_reviews.author: Terry Drummey

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love how these look but man they run big.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Angulo

customer_reviews.title: Quality and style!
customer_reviews.text: Quality and style, mhusband loves them! He had them mad into prescription sunglasses with blue tinted lense. They look great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love Persol Sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: I love Persol Sunglasses. And I really love these Persols. The look great. They fit great. And the case is solid and very cool, as well. When I lose these or they are stolen, I won't hesitate to buy another pair. In fact, I might as well do that right now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sunglasses. Great hardware. The hinges are solid and nothing feels flimsy. The tint and subtle coloring making it great fonrk
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: good quality but dimensions off
customer_reviews.text: Dimensions of ear pieces stated as 140 were actually about 132
customer_reviews.author: Scott McRae

customer_reviews.title: Frame cracked in half after one year of careful use.
customer_reviews.text: Really disappointed. I was going golfing and when taking out my sunglasses, they literally fell in half after the acetate on the bridge failed. Buyer beware I guess, I've owned them for about 13 months.

customer_reviews.title: They are cool looking but the key hole nose opening sits a ...
customer_reviews.text: They are cool looking but the key hole nose opening sits a little off on my face. Glasses are definitely cool. Probably just my big head. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: mr.bigs12

customer_reviews.title: Runs small, tight fit. Look good and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Look good but are very tight around the temples. I don't have a huge head, these are just smaller than a normal pair or sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: jordonm

customer_reviews.title: Nice but too small in size!
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than expected. More suitable for a lady than a gent.
customer_reviews.author: D. Tuncer

customer_reviews.title: great pair of sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: great pair of sunglasses. Came with a case and a manufacturer's warranty. I was slightly worried at first because they were relatively cheap but I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: aaron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them!!! They are so awsome!!! Great price. Will recommend to friends.
customer_reviews.author: leda munoz

customer_reviews.title: Love these glasses!
customer_reviews.text: Great glasses! Fit nicely and look amazing with my face shape (heart). Persol are always of very high quality and I've gotten many compliments in the short time that I've had them.
customer_reviews.author: Noah S

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and look
customer_reviews.text: I've looked all over for these and found them here. Perfect fit and look!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Stylish sunglasses.
customer_reviews.text: Great sunglasses. I was worried they were small, but they are not small at all. Fit great. NOT polarized lenses though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: He loved them!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my husband. He loved them!
customer_reviews.author: AOS

customer_reviews.title: Persol PO3019S 52mm Havana
customer_reviews.text: Great quality sunglasses, is a beautiful piece, you can tell is handmade. Unfortunately, I returned the sunglasses because the glass was too blue... not my style, I want the glass in a darker color.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Andre Dubois

customer_reviews.title: These are without a doubt the best looking and most flattering sunglasses that I have ever ...
customer_reviews.text: These are without a doubt the best looking and most flattering sunglasses that I have ever owned. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Mize

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glasses. Arrived on time with all packaging including an international guarantee certificate. Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like them a lot- well built
customer_reviews.text: Like them a lot- well built, lightweight and comfortable. Only complaint was the arms weren't parallel. The shop that put in Rx sun glass lenses fixed that to my satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: RRS

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: Width is not as wide as some I have purchase. Suggest you measure before you purchase. I have gotten many compliments on these and overall very nice sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: SO VERY ELEGANT!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sophisticated pair of sun glasses. Excellent quality. Perfect fit and true to size. Classy and Classic. I had so many compliments! Absolutely gorgeous!!
customer_reviews.author: shoe maniac

customer_reviews.title: Great gift item
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift for my SO and they look even better in person than they did online. Came with a nice case too.
customer_reviews.author: Mollie Brick

customer_reviews.title: Sides are a little too lose to wear on my ...
customer_reviews.text: Sides are a little too lose to wear on my husband's head, but he loves them! Stylish but not too stylish that it's weird.
customer_reviews.author: SGR

customer_reviews.title: Nice Shades.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice glasses. Comfortable and stylish, if I do say so myself.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses. I was really worried they would be ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sunglasses. I was really worried they would be fake because of the price, but I compared them to my other persol's and they are definitely real.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Great quality though
customer_reviews.text: Too small. Go to a store and try them on before ordering, if I knew they were so small I wouldn't have bought them. Great quality though, perfect case also. Persol, please make this design bigger!! One that looks much bigger. I would buy another pair if you do so.
customer_reviews.author: Najib

customer_reviews.title: Possibly fake
customer_reviews.text: These are either fake or refurbished. They arrived with severely bent earpieces. The connecting piece between the ear and the shade doesn't fit well together. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Seliger

customer_reviews.title: ... my case has a dent in it but I love the sunglasses
customer_reviews.text: The product box was damaged and my case has a dent in it but I love the sunglasses!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are amazing! Fit great and look even better and for the price you are getting phenomenal sunglasses
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Item arrived damaged out of the box. The frame ...
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived damaged out of the box. The frame is severely bent and the sunglasses will not rest evenly on a table. I would expect a lot more for the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great sunglasses.
customer_reviews.text: I checked them out in person before buying...saved me some money. Great sunglasses.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are great glasses!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not good with sunglasses that are not sturdy and these suit me fine. Nice looking, good fit and provide clear vision while driving. I'm pleased with my purchase...
customer_reviews.author: Norman Gauthier

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Great design and look. Might needed the 52mm size though.
customer_reviews.author: marc adler

customer_reviews.title: Great Sunglasses but are too loose
customer_reviews.text: Great sunglasses, I bought two pairs with different frames. However, this particular pair must have been a demo unit because they are extremely loose despite repeated tightenings to the point where they are unwearable.
customer_reviews.author: C.T.

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Great shades! Super high quality and comfort. Adjusts to your face after a few wears for a perfect fit. Lenses are high quality with great light filtering capabilities. Great seller, product received in perfect condition in original manufacture packaging. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Qualitity you can see!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried because of the price is below the market, only when I received I realized that it is a real persol
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Pela

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sunglasses fit great and look good. Exactly as discribed. They're sturdy as well, not flimsy at all
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Falsely advertised
customer_reviews.text: These were not advertised as womens and I didnt notice until coming on my past orders..wish I could return!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

product_meta.title: Persol Men's Terra Classic Sunglasses
product_meta.description: Light-blue lenses and a light tortoiseshell finish distinguish these Persol sunglasses, which are detailed with the brand's signature stripes at the temples.
